column3:
UPDATE:  not only Windows -- #22227.

This PR causes a failed assertion on Windows 10 Pro (20H2, build 19042.1052):

![Screenshot from 2021-06-11 22-13-26](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/121738688-389bb100-cb03-11eb-8c76-c7c4d42e7720.png)

Oh, sorry, I'm able to reproduce. Looking into it.

Stack trace at f66eceaecf464bfab5e19f3ca8fe680d8a6aa2e1

```
#0  __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:51
#1  0x00007ffff3be8921 in __GI_abort () at abort.c:79
#2  0x00007ffff3bd848a in __assert_fail_base (fmt=0x7ffff3d5f750 "%s%s%s:%u: %s%sAssertion `%s' failed.
%n", 
    assertion=assertion@entry=0x
